entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
